Package main.actor

Class Opponent

java.lang.Object
main.actor.Opponent
public class Opponent extends Object
Opponent class. Represents an opponent that the player can battle with.

    • generateOpponentBattleTeam

      public void generateOpponentBattleTeam(Inventory inventory)
      Generates a battle team for the player's opponent according to how many monsters the player has. Uses a random number generator to determine the monster types in the team.
      Parameters:
      inventory - the player's Inventory

    • opponentLevel

      Calculates the opponent's level depending on the player's current day.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the opponent's level
